scripts.build: npm run build:css && minidocs docs -c docs/contents.json -i awesome-dat -o dist -l ./node_modules/dat-design/downloads/dat-data-logo.png -t 'Dat World' -s assets/styles.css --pushstate
scripts.update: npm run update:list && npm run update:build
scripts.update:list: echo clkao/awesome-dat | ecosystem-docs sync && echo clkao/awesome-dat | ecosystem-docs read | node list.js
scripts.update:build: cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs sync && cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs read | node build.js
